original_text: The womb shall forget him; the worm shall feed sweetly on him; he shall be no more remembered; and wickedness shall be broken as a tree.
korean_text: 모태가 그를 잊어버리고 구더기가 그를 달게 먹을 것이라 그는 다시 기억되지 않을 것이니 불의가 나무처럼 꺾이리라

sentences.original_text: the worm shall feed sweetly on him
he shall be no more remembered
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 이상 기억되지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and wickedness shall be broken as a tree
